metadata.title: CVE-2023-29540 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Using a redirect embedded into sourceMappingUrls could allowfor navigation to external protocol links in sandboxed iframes withoutallow-top-navigation-to-custom-protocols. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android <112.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
